name: @mocks-server/plugin-openapi
description: Mocks server plugin allowing to create routes and collections from OpenApi definitions
author: Javier Brea
readme: --- # Mocks Server Plugin OpenApi [Mocks Server][website-url] plugin enabling to create routes and collections from OpenApi definitions. ## Usage This plugin is included in the main distribution of the Mocks Server project, so you can refer to the [official documentation website][website-url]. ## Options * __`plugins.openapi.collection.id`__ _(String | Null)_: Id for the collection to be created with __all routes from all OpenAPI documents__. Default is "openapi". When it is set to `null`, no collection will be created. * __`plugins.openapi.collection.from`__ _(String)_: When provided, the created collection will extend from this one. Read more about [how to set options in Mocks Server here](https://www.mocks-server.org/docs/configuration/how-to-change-settings). ## Contributing Contributors are welcome. Please read the [contributing guidelines](../../.github/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [code of conduct](../../.github/CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md). [website-url]: https://www.mocks-server.org
